B2.body: I don't know how to thank you. I'm only alive because of your professionalism, Miss...?
B2.speaker: Bellgates

B3.body: Pleasure to meet you, miss Strikely. You already know my name.
B3.speaker: Bellgates

B4.body: Recently, every second meeting with the Ministers can not do without attempts. I suppose you're expected to report?
B4.speaker: Bellgates

B5.body: I'm sure she's perfectly safe. There is no need to worry about her, she is an Element of Harmony. Assassinations are only part of her job. But I'm not used to it yet. I might have died if you weren't here.
B5.speaker: Bellgates

B6.body: Report to your commanding officer that you did a great job.
B6.speaker: Bellgates

B7.body: Yes, it was very unfortunate. It was stupid to hope for funding after I escaped MAS. But it was worth to try.
B7.speaker: Bellgates

B8.body: Oh, no, she understands that perfectly. And still calls me crazy. If you knew what they were doing in MAS, you'd understand perfectly.
B8.speaker: Bellgates

B9.body: If you think I'm cruel, you don't know the whole truth yet. She's more likely to take revenge on me for running away. Under normal circumstances, she would have accepted the idea without hesitation.
B9.speaker: Bellgates

B10.body: I learned a lot as a Twilight's Ministry worker. But I'm afraid that information may lead me to my grave. I think you'll understand if I refuse to say them. Take my word for it.
B10.speaker: Bellgates

B11.body: I don't doubt it, I'm sure. However, I won't tell you anything more about this now, as I intend to live as long as possible. Understand me.
B11.speaker: Bellgates

B12.body: Of course I understand. And I do not intend to take this step. If you'll excuse me, I have to go.
B12.speaker: Bellgates

B13.body: Thank you very much. I very much hope that we will not have to touch on such topics again, at least in such an unprotected place. Good-bye, Strikely.
B13.speaker: Bellgates

B7(1).body: She just don't understand what's at stake.
B7(1).speaker: Strikely

B7(2).body: I agree with her. It's too cruel
B7(2).speaker: Strikely

B10(1).body: I don't believe you. It's an Element of Harmony. How can you doubt her?
B10(1).speaker: Strikely

B11(1).body: You are already on the verge of death, do you understand that?
B11(1).speaker: Strikely

B11(2).body: Okay, I understand you. There will be no more questions
B11(2).speaker: Strikely
